messages.title: A future fair for all
messages.content: Now more than ever North west Hampshire needs an MP who will fight for jobs and homes, and to defend and improve healthcare, housing, public transport education and all our vital public services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sarah is campaigning to save jobs at Twinings, protect manufacturing jobs, and is opposed to totally unnecessary job cuts by the winning workforce at Twinings.
Labour has brought unprecedented spending growth on healthcare and education.
Sarah will work for better and truly public rail and bus services including on Sundays.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A Tory victory would be a tragedy for Britain. Labour justice or Tory cuts.

issues.economy: The banks have been bailed out with billions of our money and I believe they should be harnessed to meet social objectives and support manufacturing, with bankers' pay and bonuses tightly regulated.

housing.content: Now more than ever North west Hampshire needs an MP who will fight for jobs and homes

leaflet.personalStatement: Sarah Evans is a working mum of two young children who plays an active role in community campaigns.

politicalExperience.achievements: Sarah worked hard to win a town council for Andover, has campaigned doggedly to save Andover's Guildhall community use and backs the crucial fight to save jobs at Twinings.

contactInformation.address: Please complete and return this form to: 28, Lowry Court, Andover SP10 3SX

images.caption: SARAH JOINS PUBLIC SERVANTS CAMPAIGNING TO DEFEND JOBS AND CONDITIONS
SARAH WELCOMES VETERAN LABOUR STALWART … BENN TO NW HAMPS.
SARAH FULLY SUPPORTS THE TWININGS WORKFORCE
